scripts.sls-offline-dev: nodemon --watch src --exec AWS_XRAY_CONTEXT_MISSING=LOG_ERROR NODE_ENV=dev sls offline --stage dev
scripts.sls-offline-local: nodemon --watch src --exec AWS_XRAY_CONTEXT_MISSING=LOG_ERROR NODE_ENV=dev sls offline --stage local
scripts.seed-dynamo-dev: SLS_DEBUG=* sls dynamodb --stage dev seed --seed=DemoTable --online --region us-east-2
scripts.seed-dynamo-local: SLS_DEBUG=* sls dynamodb --stage local seed --seed=DemoTable --region us-east-2
scripts.migrate-dynamo-local: SLS_DEBUG=* sls dynamodb --stage local migrate --region us-east-2
scripts.migrate-dynamo-dev: SLS_DEBUG=* sls dynamodb --stage dev migrate --online --region us-east-2
